        Parameters:

        msg - name
        postns - (x, y) coordinate

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draws bubble display box on the point where it was clicked. Receives information to be displayed from the Activity.onTouchEvent(MotionEvent) function depending on the point selected/touched.
        Specified by:
        draw in class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
        Parameters:
        canvas - canvas
